name: computationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves the use of computers: Some of the work can be done computationally. The model that they use is computationally intensive.
formal in a way that involves the calculation of answers, amounts, results, etc.: Theories like this are computationally unprovable. Very young children may be computationally more capable than most people believe.
More examplesFewer examplesEvery step in the process can be performed computationally.This method is computationally very efficient.They tried to convince us that their approach was computationally feasible.
